Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl

Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SqliteBuilder
    Implementation of SqlBuilder for interacting with a SQLite database.
    SqliteCriteria<T>
    Implementation of Criteria for SQLite queries.
    SqliteDbHelper
    A helper class to manage database creation and version management.
    SqliteMapper
    This implementation of ObjectMapper provides methods to map domain models to SQLite table columns and vice versa.
    SqliteModelFactory
    This is an implementation of ModelFactory for processing SqliteResult queries.
    SqliteModelMap
    Concrete implementation of ModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a SQLite table.
    SqliteResult
    This implementation represents a ResultSet from a SQLite database query.
    SqliteSession
    Implementation of Session for interacting with SQLite.
    SqliteTemplate
    An implementation of SqliteOperations.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl Description

Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.
